asteroid.local

Annotation Type Local


  • @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
 @Retention(value=SOURCE)
public @interface Local
    Marks a given annotation as a local AST transformation 
    
  @Local(MyTransformationImplementation.class)
  public  @interface MyAnnotation {
     //...
  }
    Then you can use your annotation: 
    
  @MyAnnotation
  class SomeType {
     //...
  }
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends LocalTransformationImpl> value
      Sets the transformation implementation class

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends LocalTransformationImpl> value
        Sets the transformation implementation class
        Returns:
        a class representing an AST transformation implementation
        Since:
        0.1.0
